desc:
Dan Nieders\
Schweiz/Kanada, 2022, 13 Min, no Englisch, Franz√∂sisch, Spanisch

Secretly, Juan lives out his fantasies through his alter ego Elise. While Elise is flirting with Marius at a party, Juan suddenly is confronted with an obstacle to overcome: Juan must regain control of the body. A film that twists the head and mind, taking the audience into the inner world of a searching character. To end the program we promise some fucking Swiss alpine meadow romance.
title: Monochrome
